name: getCloud
description:
A brief classic-Zelda-style action-adventure game made for the Secret Santa Jam. You are lost at sea after a storm, and find yourself on an island; you must search for gear and a way to escape. The name might not make sense right away.

Essentially feature complete, though it currently lacks sound. Might add sound and polish up more later.

Default controls:

  • Arrow keys: Move.
  • Z, X: Use items.
  • Enter: Open inventory.
  • Stand next to campfires to save and activate checkpoints
